svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 20 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 20, 2024" date: "2024-01-19"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
• Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Goerli testnet: successfully upgraded to Dencun , Prysm bug patched , blob spamming
started & blob expiry can be tested from Feb 5 Testnet upgrade dates unchanged : Sepolia Jan 30 &
Holešky Feb 7 Mainnet upgrade : Tim Beiko expects minimum 1 month after Holešky upgrade Pectra (Prague
+ Electra) : Small fork late 2024; Verkle likely in following upgrade (Osaka) Candidates for
inclusion: EIP2537 (BLS precompile), EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain) & EIP7002 (EL triggerable
exits) Diagram of all proposed EIPs & viz of where each EIP fits in roadmap Presentations on batch txs
for EOAs (EIP3074), SETCODE , EIP7251 (increase max effective balance) & EIP7547 (inclusion lists)
next ACDE to discuss potential big feature: Verkle, EOF & EIP4444 (bound historical data)
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
• Goerli testnet: successfully upgraded to Dencun , Prysm bug patched , blob spamming started & blob
expiry can be tested from Feb 5
Goerli testnet: successfully upgraded to Dencun , Prysm bug patched , blob spamming started & blob
• Testnet upgrade dates unchanged : Sepolia Jan 30 & Holešky Feb 7
Testnet upgrade dates unchanged : Sepolia Jan 30 & Holešky Feb 7
• Mainnet upgrade : Tim Beiko expects minimum 1 month after Holešky upgrade
Mainnet upgrade : Tim Beiko expects minimum 1 month after Holešky upgrade
• Pectra (Prague + Electra) : Small fork late 2024; Verkle likely in following upgrade (Osaka)
Candidates for inclusion: EIP2537 (BLS precompile), EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain) & EIP7002 (EL
triggerable exits) Diagram of all proposed EIPs & viz of where each EIP fits in roadmap Presentations
on batch txs for EOAs (EIP3074), SETCODE , EIP7251 (increase max effective balance) & EIP7547
(inclusion lists)
Pectra (Prague + Electra) :
• Small fork late 2024; Verkle likely in following upgrade (Osaka)
Small fork late 2024; Verkle likely in following upgrade (Osaka)
• Candidates for inclusion: EIP2537 (BLS precompile), EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain) & EIP7002
(EL triggerable exits)
triggerable exits)
• Diagram of all proposed EIPs & viz of where each EIP fits in roadmap
Diagram of all proposed EIPs & viz of where each EIP fits in roadmap
• Presentations on batch txs for EOAs (EIP3074), SETCODE , EIP7251 (increase max effective balance) &
EIP7547 (inclusion lists)
Presentations on batch txs for EOAs (EIP3074), SETCODE , EIP7251 (increase max effective balance) &
• next ACDE to discuss potential big feature: Verkle, EOF & EIP4444 (bound historical data)
• Ephemery testnet successfully upgraded to Dencun
Ephemery testnet successfully upgraded to Dencun
• Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.6 : fork choice filter change
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.6 : fork choice filter change
Verkle
• Verkle implementers call video & notes : all client teams working on Verkle, testnet to be
relaunched and challenges with BLOCKHASH opcode
Verkle implementers call video & notes : all client teams working on Verkle, testnet to be relaunched
and challenges with BLOCKHASH opcode
• Verkle proofs & stateless clients explainer
Verkle proofs & stateless clients explainer
Client releases
• Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.14.0 : option for local block publishing signed by the validator Prysm
v4.2.1-rc.0 : fix historical roots for Goerli Dencun upgrade
Consensus layer:
• Lodestar v1.14.0 : option for local block publishing signed by the validator
Lodestar v1.14.0 : option for local block publishing signed by the validator
• Prysm v4.2.1-rc.0 : fix historical roots for Goerli Dencun upgrade
Prysm v4.2.1-rc.0 : fix historical roots for Goerli Dencun upgrade
• Execution layer: Erigon v2.57.0 : Sepolia & Holešky testnets Dencun upgrade Nethermind v1.25.1 : fix
eth_syncing behavior and extra bodies & receipts downloaded after upgrading long-living node Reth
v0.1.0-alpha.15 : consensus fix for Dencun and enables default on-disk blob store
Execution layer:
• Erigon v2.57.0 : Sepolia & Holešky testnets Dencun upgrade
Erigon v2.57.0 : Sepolia & Holešky testnets Dencun upgrade
• Nethermind v1.25.1 : fix eth_syncing behavior and extra bodies & receipts downloaded after upgrading
long-living node
Nethermind v1.25.1 : fix eth_syncing behavior and extra bodies & receipts downloaded after upgrading
• Reth v0.1.0-alpha.15 : consensus fix for Dencun and enables default on-disk blob store
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.15 : consensus fix for Dencun and enables default on-disk blob store
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 32.10% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 32.10% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly
cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 40%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
• Consensus layer: Prysm 40%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 40%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Pari: testing path to raise gas limit , local then shadowforks to ensure within burst (worst case) &
long term constraints
Pari: testing path to raise gas limit , local then shadowforks to ensure within burst (worst case) &
• Potuz: heuristics for detecting censorship so execution layer clients can signal for local building
Potuz: heuristics for detecting censorship so execution layer clients can signal for local building
For stakers
• Besu (execution layer client) performance improvements (95% of blocks processed within ~250ms) and
optimal config
MEV
• Flashbots order flow visualization using Sankey diagrams
Layer 2
• Arbitrum Orbit permissionless L2 & L3 creation , requires revenue sharing
Arbitrum Orbit permissionless L2 & L3 creation , requires revenue sharing
• Public Goods Network (PGN) shutting down in June
Public Goods Network (PGN) shutting down in June
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs Meta EIP7600 : Hardfork Meta - Pectra (Prague + Electra)
EIPs
• Meta EIP7600 : Hardfork Meta - Pectra (Prague + Electra)
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7595 : Collateralized NFT (ERC721 extension) ERC7596 : Equity shares
book-entry system ERC7597 : Signature validation extension for Permit (ERC2612) ERC7598 : Use contract
signature for signed transfer ERC7599 : Onchain autonomous AI agent NFT
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7595 : Collateralized NFT (ERC721 extension)
ERC7595 : Collateralized NFT (ERC721 extension)
• ERC7596 : Equity shares book-entry system
ERC7596 : Equity shares book-entry system
• ERC7597 : Signature validation extension for Permit (ERC2612)
ERC7597 : Signature validation extension for Permit (ERC2612)
• ERC7598 : Use contract signature for signed transfer
ERC7598 : Use contract signature for signed transfer
• ERC7599 : Onchain autonomous AI agent NFT
ERC7599 : Onchain autonomous AI agent NFT
Stuff for developers
• Foundry: Forge-std v1.7.6 : new cheat codes dumpState (write state to disk in JSON), signP256
(generate secp256r1 signatures) and toBase64 & toBase64URL
Foundry:
• Forge-std v1.7.6 : new cheat codes dumpState (write state to disk in JSON), signP256 (generate
secp256r1 signatures) and toBase64 & toBase64URL
• Remix challenge: 4 questions on zk proofs with Circom , mint NFT on Optimism
Remix challenge: 4 questions on zk proofs with Circom , mint NFT on Optimism
• GasliteToken (ERC20 base smart contract): gas optimized ERC20 with fees
GasliteToken (ERC20 base smart contract): gas optimized ERC20 with fees
• Contract obfuscation to avoid generalized front running
Contract obfuscation to avoid generalized front running
• The Rippler : fast multicaller, reverse packed encoding
The Rippler : fast multicaller, reverse packed encoding
• Vyper Jupyter plugin to deploy from Jupyter notebooks & Google Colab using titanoboa
Vyper Jupyter plugin to deploy from Jupyter notebooks & Google Colab using titanoboa
• Curta CTF ZSafe solution
Curta CTF ZSafe solution
• ABI parsers vulnerable to zero-sized types (ZSTs) DoS attack
ABI parsers vulnerable to zero-sized types (ZSTs) DoS attack
Security
• Socket/Bungee $3.3M exploit on mainnet, token approvals drained via unverified user input
Enterprise
• Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: DeFi risk assessment guidelines , feedback by April 15
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: DeFi risk assessment guidelines , feedback by April 15
• GameStop NFT marketplace shutting February 2, due to regulatory uncertainty
GameStop NFT marketplace shutting February 2, due to regulatory uncertainty
Job Listings
• Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer , Lead Engineer , Protocol Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer , Lead Engineer , Protocol Researcher
• ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
• Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.3 to 74.6 gwei, with 28.7 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.0 gwei 6.9k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.3 to 74.6 gwei, with 28.7 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
• 6.9k ETH net burn this week
6.9k ETH net burn this week
• ETHUSD : $2,419 - $2,605, currently $2,485
ETHUSD : $2,419 - $2,605, currently $2,485
• ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
• Sablier monthly unlocks streaming curve, can use like traditional payroll
Sablier monthly unlocks streaming curve, can use like traditional payroll
• Dagon (DAO singleton) live on mainnet & Optimism, add weighted token voting to any account
Dagon (DAO singleton) live on mainnet & Optimism, add weighted token voting to any account
• Zuzalu QF grants : spinoff events (Zu-villages) & digital public goods rounds
Zuzalu QF grants : spinoff events (Zu-villages) & digital public goods rounds
Regulation/business/tokens
• US IRS: $10k+ crypto transaction reporting not currently enforced
US IRS: $10k+ crypto transaction reporting not currently enforced
• EU provisional agreement on AML , customer due diligence required for €1k+ crypto transactions
EU provisional agreement on AML , customer due diligence required for €1k+ crypto transactions
General
• $32M in rugpulls from 1,300 automatically created meme tokens
$32M in rugpulls from 1,300 automatically created meme tokens
• Dark DAO lite demo for vote buying
Dark DAO lite demo for vote buying
• Trail of Bits: LeftoverLocals , recovery of data from GPU local memory
Trail of Bits: LeftoverLocals , recovery of data from GPU local memory
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-january-20-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
• Jan 22 – EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline extended
Jan 22 – EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline extended
• Jan 30 – Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
Jan 30 – Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
• Feb 2-4 – ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
Feb 2-4 – ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
• Feb 3 – Ethereum Lima Day
Feb 3 – Ethereum Lima Day
• Feb 7 – Holešky testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 29696 (assuming no issues)
Feb 7 – Holešky testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 29696 (assuming no issues)
